Abstract: In a rainbow blizzard of confetti and a symphony of neon and fireworks, a mighty crush of New Year's merrymakers welcomed the year 2000 in Times Square, the world's most famous intersection.    Undeterred by fears of terrorism or Y2K havoc, the Times Square crowd showed every sign of being the biggest and noisiest ever, bent on watching history happen, watching themselves on huge video screens and hoping that friends and relatives were watching them on television at home.
LeadParagraph: In a rainbow blizzard of confetti and a symphony of neon and fireworks, a mighty crush of New Year's merrymakers welcomed the year 2000 in Times Square, the world's most famous intersection.

Headline.Main: Joy Vanquishes Fear in Square, and Amid the Vast Throng, a Marriage Proposal
Headline.PrintHeadline: 1/1/00: AT THE CROSSROADS; Joy Vanquishes Fear in Square, and Amid the Vast Throng, a Marriage Proposal
